mapper.select: SELECT HIST_CNTT ,SW_MGMT_NO ,GTH_DTT ,EQPM_NO FROM TB_EQPM_PRCS_HIST WHERE EQPM_NO = #{EQPM_NO} ORDER BY GTH_DTT DESC LIMIT #{startRow},#{endRow}
SELECT HIST_CNTT ,SW_MGMT_NO ,GTH_DTT ,EQPM_NO FROM TB_EQPM_PRCS_HIST WHERE GTH_DTT = #{GTH_DTT} AND EQPM_NO = #{EQPM_NO} AND SW_MGMT_NO = #{SW_MGMT_NO}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_EQPM_PRCS_HIST WHERE GTH_DTT = #{GTH_DTT} AND EQPM_NO = #{EQPM_NO} AND SW_MGMT_NO = #{SW_MGMT_NO}
